name: Create Tasks in "New Requests"
Use Tags to prioritize Tasks
notes: Add Tags to label your tasks and bring structure to your Projects (it also makes tasks easier to filter). In the task sidebar, click "Tags" then "Manage" to get started.
notes_html: Add Tags to label your tasks and bring structure to your Projects (it also makes tasks easier to filter). In the task sidebar, click "Tags" then "Manage" to get started.

name: Use Checklists to split Tasks
notes:
Checklists are perfect for Tasks that are split into phases: for example if they require multiple to-dos or action items.

Simply mark off completed actions to keep track of Task progress. Use the Checklist below to mark off the things you've done so far.
notes_html:
Checklists are perfect for Tasks that are split into phases: for example if they require multiple to-dos or action items.

Simply mark off completed actions to keep track of Task progress. Use the Checklist below to mark off the things you've done so far.

name: Create a Task to track your weekly plan
notes:
Use this task as an overview for the course you're teaching this week. 

Checklists are perfect for Tasks that are split into phases: for example if they require multiple to-dos or action items. In this case, you can use each lesson as a Checklist Item.

Simply mark off completed lessons to keep track of how you're progressing.
notes_html:
Use this task as an overview for the course you're teaching this week.

Checklists are perfect for Tasks that are split into phases: for example if they require multiple to-dos or action items. In this case, you can use each lesson as a Checklist Item.

Simply mark off completed lessons to keep track of how you're progressing.

name: Meister Example: Geography Lesson
notes: The goal of this lesson is to help students understand how physical and cultural characteristics shape different regions.
notes_html: The goal of this lesson is to help students understand how physical and cultural characteristics shape different regions.

name: Use Tags to organize and filter your Project
notes:
Add Tags to label your Tasks and bring more structure to your lesson plan Project. Tags are prominently displayed on each Task tile: it's a great way to organize, filter, and visualize what needs to be done. 

In the task sidebar, click "Tags" then "Manage" to get started.
notes_html:
Add Tags to label your Tasks and bring more structure to your lesson plan Project. Tags are prominently displayed on each Task tile: it's a great way to organize, filter, and visualize what needs to be done.

In the task sidebar, click "Tags" then "Manage" to get started.
